title: File Handling
overview: Learn how to read, write, and manipulate files in Python. File handling allows you to store data persistently and process it efficiently.
practice: Write a program that counts lines in a file.
Write a program to append text to a file.
Write a program that copies one text file to another.

quiz.question: Which mode opens a file for writing?

summary: File handling in Python enables you to read, write, and manage data stored in files. Mastering these operations is essential for data processing, logging, and building real-world applications.
